button.label: New Receipt
button.supertip: Opens a form to enter customer and item details for a new receipt.

button.label: Save Receipt
button.supertip: Saves the currently displayed receipt data to a local database and Custom XML Part.

button.label: Add Item (Form)
button.screentip: Add item to current receipt form
button.supertip: Adds a new empty row to the items list in the New Receipt form. (Disabled as adding done via form)

button.label: Remove Item (Form)
button.screentip: Remove item from current receipt form
button.supertip: Removes the selected item row from the items list in the New Receipt form. (Disabled as removing done via form)

button.label: Catalog Manager
button.supertip: Opens the Catalog Manager to add, edit, or delete items from the items_catalog.xlsx.

button.label: Apply Discount
button.supertip: Applies a percentage discount to all line items in the current receipt.

button.label: Taxes Info
button.supertip: Shows information about tax rates and service charges.

button.label: Export PDF
button.supertip: Exports the currently displayed receipt as a PDF file to the Receipts folder.

button.label: Print
button.supertip: Sends the current receipt to the default printer.

button.label: Toggle Template
button.screentip: Switch between A4 and Thermal layout
button.supertip: Toggles the receipt layout between A4 and Thermal 80mm.

button.label: Find Receipts
button.supertip: Opens a form to search for previously saved receipts.

button.label: Settings
button.supertip: Adjust company info, currency, taxes, numbering, and localization settings.
